OCC.DAT:
;============================================================ ; Custom IDE Menu operations ; See Help topic "IDE Menu Plug-ins" ;============================================================
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; Get the Version number of the Worksheet API used ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ operation getVersion params numeric pApiVersion : OUT endparams
pApiVersion = 1
end ; getVersion
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; return a Struct containing menu options for the Main Menu ( ≡ )). ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ public operation getGlobalMenuOptions params struct pMenu: out endparams
; <... Your code here ...> end ; operation getGlobalMenuOptions
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; return a Struct containing menu options for the Actions menu in object editors. ; These options can be dynamic, based on the type and/or name of the current object. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ public operation getEditorMenuOptions params string pObjectUrl: in struct pMenu: out endparams
variables string vTypeDescr, vType, vName numeric vPos endvariables
pMenu->$name = "menu"
; parse the object URL into the type and object name vPos = $split(pObjectUrl, 1,":",vType,vName) selectcase vType case "cpt" ;call addOption(pMenu, "Test with Debug", "MYMENUCALLBACK", "testWithDebug", 1) endselectcase return 0
end ; operation getEditorMenuOptions

;============================================================ ; Custom IDE Worksheet operations ; See Help topic "Worksheet Plug-in Operations" ;============================================================
;------------------------------------------------------------ ; Get the Version number of the Worksheet API used ;------------------------------------------------------------ operation getVersion params numeric pApiVersion : OUT endparams
pApiVersion = 1
end ; getVersion
;------------------------------------------------------------ ; Return a Struct with the worksheet title & tooltip ;------------------------------------------------------------ operation getWorksheetOptions params struct pWorkSheet : out endparams
pWorkSheet = $newstruct ; TODO: Change the title and tooltip pWorkSheet->title = "Custom" pWorkSheet->tooltip = "Show Custom Worksheet" end ; getWorkSheetOptions
;------------------------------------------------------------ ; start the component with the context provided by the IDE. ;------------------------------------------------------------ operation ws_activate params string pObjectUrl : IN endparams variables struct stats endvariables
activate "IDE_API_1".outputMessage("Execute trigger (Url=%%pObjectUrl).") if ($procerror != 0) putmess "Activate error: %%$procerror%%%, %%$procerrorcontext%%%" endif
;TODO: Implement your preDisplay logic ;$URL$ = pObjectUrl ;stats = $newstruct ;activate "COMPSTATSVC".genStatistics( pObjectUrl, stats) ;call loadStats( pObjectUrl, stats ) edit/nonmodal
end ; operation ws_activate
